fields.title: Review: Horizon Zero Dawn Remaster
fields.content: The Horizon Zero Dawn Remaster brings stunning visuals and smoother gameplay, making an already great game even better.
fields.excerpt: A remaster that redefines Aloy's journey in spectacular fashion.
fields.image_alt: Aloy standing with her bow in Horizon Zero Dawn Remaster

fields.title: Elder Scrolls VI: What We Know So Far
fields.content: Bethesda has teased fans with minimal information, but here’s a breakdown of what we know about the next Elder Scrolls game.
fields.excerpt: Breaking down the latest news and rumors on Elder Scrolls VI.
fields.image_alt: Concept art for Elder Scrolls VI

fields.title: The Rise of Stealth Gameplay in Modern Gaming
fields.content: From Assassin’s Creed to Hitman, stealth mechanics have become a cornerstone of modern games. Here’s why they matter.
fields.excerpt: Exploring why stealth gameplay resonates with players and developers alike.
fields.image_alt: A character hiding in shadows in a stealth game

fields.title: Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty Review
fields.content: The Phantom Liberty DLC breathes new life into Cyberpunk 2077 with a compelling storyline and impactful choices.
fields.excerpt: CD Projekt Red delivers an exceptional expansion for Cyberpunk 2077.
fields.image_alt: Key art for Cyberpunk 2077 Phantom Liberty

fields.title: Gaming News: The Game Awards 2024 Nominees Announced
fields.content: The Game Awards 2024 nominees include titles like Starfield, Baldur's Gate 3, and Spider-Man 2. Here’s the full list.
fields.excerpt: Celebrating the best in gaming: The Game Awards 2024 nominees.
